comments:
Not sure if this was reproducable but I:

- changed some of my project-specific compiler preferences
- it prompted me for a rebuild
- I waited a bit but then hit Cancel on the pref page
- I got the "job blocked" dialog and cancelled the auto-build job
- noticed this in my log file
